vivek srinivasan wrote:

>Hi Junitians,
>Thx for all the time and help in all my previous
>queries.This is question i have for a database unit
>testing.
>I have created a table called FlightInfo and stored
>data into it. What i need is to write a testcase to
>check for a null condition.ie if a null value is
>inserted into the database, it should "spit" out that
>error!!
>I am sending a fragment of code i have written.
>Thanks again for your time and help.
>

And you'd like us to write that test for you?

How about giving it a whirl yourself first, sharing that test with us, 
then asking any specific questions you might have.  I'd be in a much 
better position to help you then, if necessary.

Mike
